name: NCSSM Online
description: A collection of virtual learning opportunities from NCSSM, including full courses and enrichment experiences like math circles and inquiry-based academic exploration offered during the school year.

name: NCSSM Connect
description: Real-time, instructor-led NCSSM courses delivered through partner high schools, often provided at no cost to enrolled students.

name: Chapel Hill Math Circle
description: A collaborative math enrichment program where students tackle advanced concepts and challenging problems in a group setting, typically meeting twice each month.

name: Durham Tech Dual Enrollment
description: College-level coursework options that allow qualified high school students to earn college credit while completing their high school education, with eligibility requirements depending on the pathway.

name: Wake Tech Dual Enrollment
description: A tuition-free program that enables eligible high school students to earn college credits or workforce credentials, often counting toward both high school graduation and future college goals.
